Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity

The root package of Hedera Hashgraph Identity framework SDK.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HederaDid
    Hedera Decentralized Identifier.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DidDocumentBase
    The base for a DID document generation in JSON-LD format.
    DidDocumentJsonProperties
    Key property names in DID document standard.
    DidParser
    DID parser for Hedera DIDs.
    DidSyntax
    Hedera DID method syntax.
    DidSyntax.MethodSpecificParameter
    Hedera DID method-specific URL Parameters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DidMethodOperation
    The operation type to be performed on the DID document.
    DidSyntax.Method
    Hedera DID Method.
    HederaNetwork
    Hedera networks.
